ModMetaData.name: Pathfinder Races
ModMetaData.author: Confetti
ModMetaData.description:
Adds the core races of Pathfinder to Rimworld.
Should hopefully add Elves, Halflings, Gnomes, Goblins, Dwarves, and Orcs.
Dependencies: - Humanoid Alien Races 2.0
Credits and thanks: - erdelf for the Humanoid Alien Framework
